titleStmt.title: SII 8.48: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 48. (A.R. No. 460 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalabhuvaṉaccakravattikaḷ śrīAvaṉiĀḷappiṟantārāṉa kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu Eṭṭāvatu coḻako ṉolai . teṉṉavaṉ brahmamārāyarum jayatuṅkappallavaraiyarum tillaiAmpalappallavaraiyarum Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrīmāheśvarak kaṅkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum cāmutāyañ ceyvārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇṭu viṭu tantatāvatu .
koyilukkum tirukkāmakkoṭṭamuṭaiya periyanācciyārukkum cāttiAruḷac ceṅkaḻunīrt tiruppaḷḷittāmam Ākkit tiruppūmaṇṭapattukku mutalāka Eṇṇap perumpaṟṟappuliyūr piṭākai paḷḷippaṭaiyāṉa vikkiramacoḻanallūril vikkiramacoḻan tiruvitiyilt teṉpakkattu meṟkaṭaiyap palavarayvaiyāṉa nilattup palapaṇi nimantakkāṟar jīvita māṟik kūttāṭunāyaṉ Eṉṉum perāl ceyta tiruvoṭainilam Oṉṟaraiyum Ikkaṭṭaḷaiyil ceṅkaṉivāyantiru
nantavaṉattu melpakkattu nāṟpatteṇṇāyiravaṉ maṭappuṟa nilattut tiruvoṭaiyākac ceyta nila māṟumāvum Ivvūrp piṭākai maturāntakap periḷamaināṭṭu paṇṇaṅkuṭic ceriyāṉa parakeśarinallūrilum maṇalūrāṉa kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻanallūrilum kaṇṇuṭaiccīya ṉeṉṉum perāl ceyvitta tiruvoṭaikku mulaparuṣaiyār nilattup palarpakkalilum Uṭaiyār tirukkiḷāñceṭiyuṭaiyār civanāmattum Uḻaiccāṇaṉ kalaiyaṉ sabhāpatiperil vilaikoṇṭa Ū
rppaṭi nilam Iraṇṭe muṉṟumā Araikkāṇiyiṉāl nilam Iraṇṭe mukkāle Araikkāṇi muntirikaik kīḻk kālum Ivvūr nilattu cekkiḻāṉ vairātarāyar ceyvittat tiruttoṇṭarciruraittāṉ tiruṉantavaṉattukku Ivar koṇṭu viṭṭa Ūr māvinta kaṭamai kuṭimai kaḻittu kalveṭṭuppeṟṟa nilamāyt tiruvoṭaiyi lakappaṭṭa nilam Eṭṭumāk kāṇi muntirikaik kīḻk kālum poṉmeyntaperumāḷ tiruṉantavaṉattuṭaṉ kūṭiṉa makaṉaṅkakkāṟan tirunantavaṉakkuṭi
kaḷ jivitattu Akappaṭṭa palavaravai nilam Iraṇṭumā mukkāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻaraiyum Āka nilam muṉṟe Āṟumāk kāṇi Araikkāṇi muntirikaiyum veḷarpāṭiyil palapaṇi nimantakkāṟar jīvitamāṉa nilattut tāykkorampokātāṉ coḻakoṉeṉṉum perālc ceyta tiruvoṭainilam Iruveliyum tiyākavalliccaruppetimaṅkalattu māṟaṉpāṭi nattattukku meṟkkuppaṭṭa nilattuk kiḻakkaṭaiyaniṉṟa vaḷākameṉṉum perāl ceyta coḻakoṉ tiruvoṭai nilam patiṟṟu veliyum
kīḻpūntamaṅkalattuc coḻakoṉtiruvoṭai Eṉṉum perāl ceyta tiruvoṭai nilam nālveliyum śrīviranārāyaṇaccaruppetimaṅkalattup piṭākai Akkāramaṅkalamāṉa tiruvampalapperumpaḷḷinallūril ceyvitta ceṅkaṉivāyaṉ tiruōṭai nilam Iraṇṭaraiyum puṉavāyil koṉṟainilattuc ceṅkaṉivāyaṉ tiruōṭai nilam kāle Araikkālum perumpeṟṟapuliyūril Irumarapuntuyyaperumāḷerit teṉpakkattum melpakkattum Erikkuṉikkalāṉa nilattu Āḷuṭaiyataṉiṉāyakaṉ Eṉṉum
civaṉāmattāl ceyta tiruoṭaiyum tiruOṭaikkuṭikaḷ kuṭiiruppu Uḷpaṭṭa nilam Oṉṟaraiyum tiruOṭaiyākac ceytu ceṅkaḻuṉirākki tiruppaḷḷittāmam Eṇṇavum IttiruOṭaikaḷil palapaṇi nivantakkāṟar jivitattu Akappaṭṭa nilattukku talaimāṟu jivitam Aṭaittukkuṭukkavum perumpaṟṟappuliyūr nilattu palarpakkalum vilaikoṇṭa nilattukku vaṭakku nilam Orumāviṉ kiḻaraiye Orumāvaraiyum Ūrmā Īnta kaṭamai kuṭimai tavira mulaparuṣaiyār Eḻutiṉa niyokappaṭiye taviravum Iṉṉiyokamum nilam
vilaikoṇṭa pramāṇaṅkaḷum tirukkai Oṭṭip paṇṭārattu Oṭukkavum Ippaṭikku tirumāḷikaiyil kal veṭṭavum kaṭavatāka paṇṇuvate . Ippaṭikku Ivai coḻakoṉ Eḻutteṉṟum Inta tiruOṭaikaḷ Avaṉi Āḷappiṟantārāṉa kopperuñciṅkatevar tirumeṉikku naṉṟāka Ivar mutalikaḷil perumāḷppiḷḷai Āṉa coḻakoṉār ceyvittuk kal veṭṭiyatu . Evalttiṭṭiṉpaṭi .
Digital edition of SII 8.48 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
